title: Knight Rider 2008 TV Pilot (Merry)
description:
Knight Rider Pilot 2008
Aired 2/17/2008

This was created as a backdoor pilot for the new series Airing Sept 2008

24 year-old Stanford University Ph.D. candidate Sarah Graiman is set to follow in her genius father Charles? footsteps. Her life takes a dramatic turn when men try to abduct her. She receives a mysterious phone call from KITT, a car of her father?s creation, letting her know that her father is in danger. Sarah and KITT set off to recruit her childhood friend Mike Tracer into helping them figure out who has her father and is trying to steal KITT. Mike, having just returned from serving in Iraq is jaded and reluctant to help, but eventually agrees. This two-hour movie event is an update of the classic 1980s television series starring Justin Bruening, Deanna Russo, Sydney Tamiia Poitier, and Bruce Davison, with a special guest appearance by David Hasselhoff
